name: Candy Hunt || Scrolling Platformer
description:
★ Hey, its @Alolex1 I present you :

CANDY HUNT V.1 (It dont have an end, just find the candies and all the other secret stuff, get all the achievements and explore)

★Features a really long level, 10 candies, a key, an easter egg, multiplayer, achievements, skins and mobile supported.

★Controls :

-Mobile controls or PC controls

-Click on objects to interact

-Get abilities with skins

★Story :

You are stuck in a creepy school.... You must find the 10 candies and complete all the achievements!

★Achievements (Gives you 1 candy) : 

1- Jump 100 times

2- Collect 10 candies

3- All skins

4- Use chat

5- Meet an other player

6- Find the easter egg

7- Find the science book

8- Find the secret key

9- Play 5 minutes

10- Die

ENJOY!

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
